name: audit-notification
description: Detailed information about an audited operation including source, target, operation type, and results.

fields.name: source-timestamp
fields.description: The timestamp from the source device.

fields.name: target-timestamp
fields.description: The timestamp from the target device.

fields.name: source-device
fields.description: The device that initiated the operation.

fields.name: source-object
fields.description: The object on the source device that initiated the operation.

fields.name: operation
fields.description: The type of operation that was performed.

fields.name: source-comment
fields.description: Optional comment from the source device.

fields.name: target-comment
fields.description: Optional comment from the target device.

fields.name: invoke-id
fields.description: The invoke ID of the related service request.

fields.name: source-user-id
fields.description: The user ID on the source device.

fields.name: source-user-role
fields.description: The user role on the source device.

fields.name: target-device
fields.description: The device that was the target of the operation.

fields.name: target-object
fields.description: The object on the target device that was affected.

fields.name: target-property
fields.description: The property on the target object that was affected.

fields.name: target-priority
fields.description: The priority level used for the operation (1-16).

fields.name: target-value
fields.description: The value that was written or requested.

fields.name: result
fields.description: Error information if the operation failed.
